oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Richland Market, from the Nashville Times, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An illustration of the Richland Market, published in the Nashville Times newspaper (1940). The grocery store was located at 3031 West End Avenue, cited in the 1941 City Directory, associated with W. Ewing Smith and Joseph G. Hester. Forms part of the Nashville Times newspaper collection. 1 digital photo.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Smith, W. Ewing; Hester, Joseph G.
